summary: This document discusses various allegations involving Jeffrey E. Epstein and Donald J. Trump, including references to a lawsuit filed against them. It highlights claims of sexual misconduct and the legal implications surrounding these allegations. The document also mentions Epstein's status as a Level 3 offender.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is mentioned as a co-defendant in a lawsuit alongside Donald J. Trump, with allegations of sexual misconduct against him.

persons.name: Donald J. Trump
persons.context: Trump is named as a co-defendant in the same lawsuit as Epstein, facing allegations of rape and misconduct.

connections.description: Both Epstein and Trump are named as defendants in a lawsuit alleging sexual misconduct.

events.title: Lawsuit Filed
events.description: A lawsuit was filed against Donald J. Trump and Jeffrey E. Epstein alleging sexual misconduct.

keyFacts: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as a Level 3 offender, the highest classification for sex offenders.
The document references a lawsuit involving allegations of rape against Donald J. Trump and Jeffrey E. Epstein.
The allegations include claims of misconduct involving a minor.
